__e: Our father has told him before passing away
Your husband and the three from the photo were the only ones to make it out alive.
Those two days were the best days of my life!
"Not being able to reach you isn't to lose you, world" were his last words.
Would you believe those were is first words?
I'm not saying that's what killed my grandma, but "punch bowl" were her last words.
It sounds a very lonely time for you.
My first creatures were children, like the one you found.
Little boys who tried to shield their mothers were shot.
It was the night my mom, my brother, and my sister was murdered... With a hammer.
And five years ago, my father and brother were killed.
